page.title: 02 FACILITIES IN EIRIAS PARK
page.content: Situated within Eirias Park the Colwyn Leisure Centre is designed to cater for indoor recreational activities to suit all age groups.The centre was opened by Her Royal Highness Princess Margaret on May 16th.1981.It cost about two million pounds to build.The main sports hall has markings on the floor for thirteen different sports.There are many rooms including a fitness training room,general activities room and squash courts.The sauna and solarium provide a pleasant place to relax.The swimming pool is twenty five metres long and nine metres wide with a central island and beach area.The water is ozone treated.Outside, in the park,is a children's playground,tennis courts,a boating lake,bowling greens and a golf course.
